In this game, you will participate in an eBay auction for an item against 2 other bidders. This auction will last for 10 days. All dollar amounts in this game are in US Dollars ($).

Item Details:
Item Description: 256GB IPhone 16 pro
Item Condition: used
Your Private Value: At the start of each round, bidders will see their value for the item, randomly drawn between $0 and $99, with all values equally likely. After learning your value for the item, you will submit a maximum bid. Bids must be between $0 and $99 in $1 increments.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.
You are Bidder Andy. Your private value for this item is $11. This is the maximum amount you are willing to pay. Keep this value private.
There are in total 10 days of bidding and this is day 0. The random ordering of this day is Bidder Andy, Bidder Charles, Bidder Betty.
You haven't placed any bid. . If you have already placed bids, you can only increase your bid or hold your current bid.
The previous proxy bids are: .
The current price is 0.
Your response must use these EXACT tags below. Don't miss the amount.
```

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Item Condition: used
Your Private Value: At the start of each round, bidders will see their value for the item, randomly drawn between $0 and $99, with all values equally likely. After learning your value for the item, you will submit a maximum bid. Bids must be between $0 and $99 in $1 increments.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Item Condition: used
Your Private Value: At the start of each round, bidders will see their value for the item, randomly drawn between $0 and $99, with all values equally likely. After learning your value for the item, you will submit a maximum bid. Bids must be between $0 and $99 in $1 increments.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

In this game, you will participate in an eBay auction for an item against 2 other bidders. This auction will last for 10 days. All dollar amounts in this game are in US Dollars ($).

Item Details:
Item Description: 256GB IPhone 16 pro
Item Condition: used
Your Private Value: At the start of each round, bidders will see their value for the item, randomly drawn between $0 and $99, with all values equally likely. After learning your value for the item, you will submit a maximum bid. Bids must be between $0 and $99 in $1 increments.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Your Private Value: At the start of each round, bidders will see their value for the item, randomly drawn between $0 and $99, with all values equally likely. After learning your value for the item, you will submit a maximum bid. Bids must be between $0 and $99 in $1 increments.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Each day you will see the current price and have the opportunity to increase your maximum bid. If you do not want to increase your maximum bid, then output HOLD.

You may place bids at any point during the auction, even on the final day. However, if no bidder produces a maximum bid above the hidden reserve price, the seller will retain the good and the bidders will be informed that there is currently no bidder in the lead. No bidder will know if they (or anyone else) is the final bidder on the last day.

If the reserve is met, the highest bidder wins the prize and pays the auction price at the time the auction’s clock expired. If you win, your earnings will increase by your value for the prize, and decrease by the final auction price. If you don't win, your earnings will remain unchanged. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

Auction Format:
This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding." This means that if you wish to enter the auction, you should submit your maximum bid, and eBay will automatically bid on your behalf, up to your maximum, only as much as necessary to maintain your position as the highest bidder. Ties for the highest bid will be resolved randomly.

This is an eBay auction with a hidden reserve price. The auction starts at $0 and will last for 10 days. eBay uses "proxy bidding."
